Features.Name: Cooking evenly
Features.Negative characteristics: Not convinced that any small microwave cooks as evenly as a full size one

Features.Name: Ease of use
Features.Positive characteristics: Stylish and easy to use, one touch and it's done, easy to use with preset buttons, great purchase, easy to operate and works well

Features.Name: Value for money
Features.Positive characteristics: A new microwave for a great price of just under Â£100, good value for money

Features.Name: Design
Features.Positive characteristics: Very smart looking microwave, great microwave and really looks nice on the worktop

Features.Name: Direct input time
Features.Positive characteristics: Ability to directly input a time, works well and is responsive, great purchase

Features.Name: Quality
Features.Negative characteristics: My microwave had been working with a quality slightly below other products on the market, it no longer works, sadly warranty lasts 1 year, will never buy another Toshiba microwave again

Features.Name: Heating fast food
Features.Negative characteristics: Had to get used to it, used to have a convection oven and microwave in one

Features.Name: Recommendation
Features.Positive characteristics: Would recommend it to anyone to purchase
